scripts.up: sudo docker compose pull && sudo docker compose $COMPOSE_ARGS up $DOCKER_ARGS
scripts.dev: npm run down && COMPOSE_ARGS="-f docker-compose.dev.yml" DOCKER_ARGS="--build" npm run up
scripts.update: git pull && docker compose pull && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && DOCKER_ARGS="--force-recreate -d" npm run up
scripts.update-service: git pull && docker compose pull $SERVICE && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && DOCKER_ARGS="--force-recreate -d $SERVICE" npm run up
scripts.start: git pull && docker compose pull && npm run down && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && DOCKER_ARGS="--force-recreate -d" npm run up
